QuestData.Title: Whisperwind Grove
QuestData.Description: You've been such a big help here!$B$BI'm gonna stay here a while and look after poor Mr. Tauren until he stops throwing up so much. Why don't you head north to Whisperwind Grove? It's really pretty there, and all the druids are so friendly!$B$BYou should tell Miss Puregrove I'm okay, she'll worry if I'm gone too long. She might ask you to help with her flowers, too! So fun!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Tender Puregrove at Whisperwind Grove.
QuestData.RewardText: Kelnir? Hahaha...$B$BSometimes I wonder if her chatter drove all the other dryads away. But I'm glad she is safe.$B$BWelcome to Whisperwind Grove, $c. Hold peace in your heart, and you will find a home here.
